== Main Inclusion Report for console-setup ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/c/console-setup, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed for <nowiki>[[https://features.launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+spec/sane-installer-keyboard|sane-installer-keyboard]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Security:''
** Not relevant, it runs in the installer to set up the keyboard
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Standard debhelper, no patch system needed as this is a native package.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
